response.headline: Seoul Sky Bridge at Lotte World Tower observation deck 555m high
response.summary: Seoul Sky Bridge at Lotte World Tower in Songpa-gu offers panoramic city views from 555 meters high. The glass-floored observation deck provides aerial perspectives of Seoul's skyline.

image_details.key_interest: Glass-floored observation deck at extreme height
